footnotes: Hawawezi kulingana wakawa sawa:- asiye hidika kuifuata Haki kwa ujinga wake na mwenye kufuata Njia ya uwongofu kwa ujuzi wake; wala uwongo na kweli; wala kivuli na upepo umoto

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
